Description: TURBOTECH is a French start-up that develops on-board electric generation solutions for hybrid-electric aircrafts.
Full Description: TURBOTECH is a French start-up that develops on-board electric generation solutions for hybrid-electric aircrafts. Our solution consists of a very light and compact 55 kW turbo-generator in which a micro-turbine directly drives a high speed generator. This device produces electricity from virtually any fuel source (biofuel, hydrogen, Jet-A1, diesel, gasoline, etc...). All the while, maintaining a very high efficiency thanks to a heat exchanger that recovers -usually wasted- exhaust heat energy. TURBOTECH also develops a small 100 hp Turboprop dedicated to light aircrafts (135 hp for helicopters). It is equipped with the same heat exchanger as the turbogenerator, for a fuel consumption equivalent to best-in-class piston engines while being much lighter, quieter and more reliable.

Industry Groups: Energy, Manufacturing, Science and Engineering

Description: Second Heart Assist develops a minimally invasive circulatory support platform based on proprietary aortic stent pump technology.
Full Description: Second Heart is developing a minimally invasive circulatory support platform based on proprietary aortic stent pump technology. The platform will be deployed using low-profile catheter-based techniques and will provide either temporary or chronic circulatory support, depending on the specific needs of the patient. Second Heart's initial product will be a catheter-based temporary assist pump to treat patients with acute decompensated heart failure and to provide circulatory support to those undergoing high-risk percutaneous coronary intervention (PCI). The second application will be a wirelessly powered circulatory assist pump that will provide chronic circulatory support for heart failure patients.

Description: Pine Biotech brings computational big-data analysis tools to the Agrotech and Biotech industries to address industry-specific challenges.
Full Description: Pine Biotech was Incorporated in September 2014, and moved into the New Orleans Bioinnovation Center in 2016. Pine Biotech is commercializing a machine learning biomedical data analysis platform, T-BioInfo, in collaboration with the Tauber Bioinformatics Research Center and the University of Haifa. The platform is designed to serve unmet needs in clinical studies, academic research and education. This solution is different than other biomedical analysis software currently available. The platform enables researchers to conduct comprehensive analysis of large data using an intuitive interface. Molecular data reveals important mechanisms of actions that are best studied as a system, making this integrative approach critical for understanding and treating disease. The machine learning platform utilizes algorithms developed over years of research and trained in many academic projects.

Industries: Affiliate Marketing, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency, Digital Marketing, Multi-level Marketing, Sharing Economy
Description: Re-inventing the link, letting you earn your fair reward on every link you share online.
Full Description: The digital ad sector is controlled by a handful of companies. While blockchain solutions have tried to combat this centralization, they haven’t attracted the masses because the solutions are incompatible with Web 2.0, and the blockchains they are built on fall short on either security, scalability, or decentralization. 2key Network is disrupting the sector by creating a seamless solution: integrating smart contracts into HTML links. Smart Links are compatible with not only the Web 3.0, but also the Web 2.0 as everyone on the net already utilizes/shares links. The Smart Link natively tracks who a link has been shared with and, if a link leads to a revenue-driving action, every sharer gets a share of the pie. 2key Network is democratizing distribution of value by enhancing something people already do: share links. To support network demands, 2key is built on its own second-layer Ethereum solution that crushes the blockchain trilemma.
Headquarters Regions: Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA), Middle East
Industry Groups: Advertising, Blockchain and Cryptocurrency, Financial Services, Other, Payments, Sales and Marketing, Software

Description: Developing an AI-digital manufacturing platform to unlock the potential of cell cultivation
Full Description: Alt Atlas is developing an AI-digital manufacturing platform linked to cell lines and smart tools allowing to reach production states faster and in a cost-effective way. Platform technology. B2B. Phase I: Cultivated meat. Phase II: Biotech (in-vitro toxicology testing, disease modeling). After almost a decade and billions invested, cultivated meat is still not in the market. According to GFI and New Harvest (main NPOs), AI is an underused tool in the field and is set to solve the complex multi-variable multi-factor scale-up challenge. In addition to that, the lack of relevant cell lines (cultivated meat starter material) is lacking and that is preventing innovation in the field. Product: Novel cell lines (non-GMO, multiple animal species) and how to use them (customized AI-based services). Alt Atlas is a technology enabler. Customers: cultivated meat B2C companies (producing the meat). The team has over 70 years of relevant combined experience at top universities, multinational food and agritech corporations and in building a StartUp in the field. The team members have: developed bioinformatic software platforms and tools, established state-of the art stem cell lines to improve human health and pioneered the cultivated meat ecosystem in Latin America.

Description: A single platform for truly connected commerce - connecting in-store to online instantly.
Full Description: Stored. was founded on the simple understanding that consumer behaviours have changed, and that disconnected journeys online & offline have led to poor consumer experience and reduced conversion for retailers. With the average number of product touch points from consideration to purchase now 6, consumers are disparately saving products that they intend to return to later - screenshots, open tabs, saving links and taking pictures in-store.  Stored. will change this by providing consumers with a single space to save products, from any retailer, any website, app or physical store, and allowing them to share, track and complete purchase when the time to buy is now.  Stored. will support retailers in providing them with visibility of offline to online journeys previously unseen, allowing them to influence and incentivise positive customer outcomes and conversion. Founded in July 2022 by Co-Founders Danny Howe, former Managing Director of WorldFirst (Ant Group) & Lee Hart, former General Manager of Fiserv UK, Stored. have raised over £500k in Angel investment to date from notable investors including Nick Robinson, Co-Founder of WorldFirst and strategic investor Nicolas James Group. Stored. has pre-registered over 2,500 shoppers in the first month of launch and are now actively onboarding pilot retailers for a go-live scheduled in January 2023.

Description: Certified Ultra-Capacitor Electric Shared Mobility, Transport-as-a-Service, Connected IOT Vehicle System, Charging Infrastructure
Full Description: Our Purpose  We exist to help build a future where the world is a better place, where urban cities are more livable for everyone, where people/goods and services are connected 24/7 through sustainable transportation technologies.  Our Vision  Our vision of the future, is in which, urban cities around the world are operating efficiently, sustainably and liveable. We envision QIQ to be a platform of change in the transportation sector in urban cities, improving millions of lives.  Our Mission  To inspire greater living and connectivity between people, goods and services by providing transportation technology that is designed and built for the masses living in urban cities.  Our Values  1. Serve the People  We pledge to remember that at the end of the day, we are building the company, innovating in technology and providing services to make the world a better place.  2. Openness and Transparency  We will promote an open culture that encourages teamwork and trust. We believe in trying new things, testing, failing, tweaking and learning. We believe that everything can be improved and overcome.  3. Advancing Innovation and Technology  We will never stop innovating and advancing technology to improve lives or people living in the Urban Community. Our criteria for the building the best product, rest on functions, reliability, safety and friendly to all ages and gender.  4. Equal Partnerships  We believe that all partnerships both internal and external are important. We promise to treat all form of partnership with respect, fairness and integrity - expecting the same in return	 			 5. Dream Never stop dreaming. Never stop believing. Never stop Trying.  Executive Summary QIQ (pronounced as “KIK”) is a Singapore Headquartered Technology Company that is making its mission to “reimagine urban transportation” for the global industry. Its aim is to make transportation shared, greener and more accessible to the masses and in return, relieve the overburdened public transport systems of cities worldwide by working with governments around the world, private landowners, and transport operators, creating their own ecosystem of shared electric vehicles. We believe that today’s electric vehicles of different classes are not designed to be robust, reliable for a sharing economy.  Based on QIQ’s new Ultra-Dense Energy Capacitor Technology, we have invented two different lightweight vehicles such as the electric bicycle and scooters (PMDs) that can be fully charged in minutes. Today, we are reimagining how future last-mile electric shared vehicles would look, designed for all ages and city conditions, hence the development of a Semi-Autonomous Platooning POD. (See attached Image)  Our technological offering consists of a complete end-to-end service solution which includes a cloud-based Vehicle Cloud Command & Control System (VCCS) that can remotely collect all vehicle telematics and traffic condition data. Our lightweight vehicles such as the electric bicycle and scooters are ideal for new deployment in cities that are looking for a simple and clean deployment with charging docking stations. By 2021, QIQ’s Semi-Autonomous Platooning POD will be fully functional and ready for on-road deployment and would be an ideal system for urban cities looking to provide car-sharing and logistic vehicle options.  So why is QIQ a company that pledges to “reimagine urban transportation?” That is because we believe that people's lives will be improved when smarter mobility options are introduced and people/goods and services are connected 24/7 through sustainable transportation technologies.

Once you create an event registration page, you can offer free or paid tickets, manage registrations, connect with brand sponsors, and provide networking for your attendees. It’s all free! Sign-up here: plainsightevents.com/hosts For event-goers, we simplify networking. Going to events is an investment of our time, money, and energy. We will help you invest wisely into the right events. Find upcoming events in your area and connect with 30,000+ event goers in the Plain Sight App based on your goals and interests. Download the app today to start connecting in a more intentional and meaningful way: plainsightevents.com/eventgoers

Full Description: Tools have contributed to our history by allowing us to overcome our biological limits and make our world a better place. Excavators make it possible even for a small child to exercise great power and bicycles allow us to move faster than wild beasts. As modern society began, personal computers created by Steve Jobs and Steve Wozniak from Apple gave us power to overcome our physical and even mental limits. We have always overcome our limits and created values with tools. Tools are the source of a transcendent power unavailable to other species. However, the information revolution caused those tools to lose their own features. Tools in this digital era do not give us power, but are rather a means of control. 'Control' became a measure of productivity in order to prevent loss in our work caused by the conversion from analog to digital. We refuse the age of tools that considers us subjects to be 'controlled' and instead try to make a tool that can make our vales transcendent. We deliberate to create tools like bicycles that make us move faster than wild beasts. We want to develop such tools constantly and provide them to the world.

The mission of the company is to deliver maintenance-free femtosecond lasers with an exceptionally long lifetime. Long years of research have led Fluence to create shock and temperature immune femtosecond lasers which can be used in various fields: from science to industrial micromachining. Fluence expertise and products extend to optical parametric amplifiers and laser pulse diagnostics equipment with a revision to the standard approach.

Description: 3one4 Capital is an early-stage venture capital fund based in Bangalore, India.
Full Description: 3one4 Capital is an early-stage venture capital firm based in Bangalore, India. The firm works in select market categories and in the intersection of adjacencies that are large, growing, and ready for unique products and services. The themes pursued are SaaS, Enterprise & SMB Automation, Fintech, Consumer Internet, and Digital Health, with a focus on areas such as machine-driven actionable intelligence services, digital media, ambient intelligence technologies, logistics and distribution, and climate tech. Through a deep involvement strategy, the firm works with founding teams and subject-matter experts to prioritize and strategize for product-market fit, and then optimize for defensibility and growth in revenue and impact. With a focus on margins and on delivering uncompromised end-user experiences, the firm aims to reduce risk, detect new growth opportunities, and return rewarding outcomes to all the stakeholders involved. 3one4’s investments are biased towards companies exploiting technology to create, grow, or dominate large markets in India. The firm also invests a portion of its capital in US-focused companies that have feedforward effects into the themes being pursued in India. 3one4 manages a corpus of INR 3,710 Cr+ (USD 510M+), AUM of INR 6,000Cr+ (USD 750M+), and a portfolio of over 80 companies across the early stage. 3one4's investments include Licious, Darwinbox, Open, BetterPlace, Jupiter, KukuFM, Koo, Dozee, and Tracxn.

Description: The Red Warriors FC Berhad is a professional football club based in Kota Bharu, Kelantan, Malaysia
Full Description: The Red Warriors FC Berhad is a professional football club based in Kota Bharu, Kelantan, Malaysia. The football team has played in the second tier of Malaysian football, Malaysia Premier League since 2019. Founded in 1946, they have a long-standing rivalry with Terengganu, the two east coast teams involved in what is known as the East Coast Derby. Their home is the 22,000-seat Sultan Muhammad IV Stadium. Kelantan's regular kit colours are red shirt and shorts with a white pattern on the side.  The team had their first major success in the 2012 season when they have won the treble which is the Malaysia Super League championship, Malaysia FA Cup, and Malaysia Cup. Domestically, TRW has won the Malaysia Super League Championship on 2 occasions, most recently in the 2012 season, 2 Malaysia Cup titles, 2 Malaysia FA Cup titles, 1 Charity Shield, and 1 Malaysia Premier League title. 2012 was their debut playing in the AFC Cup. They played well in the group stage to gain first place. However, the team lost in the quarter-final to Erbil SC.  On 6 September 2020, Kelantan FA was privatized and is now owns by Norizam Tukiman, Group CEO of Unclezam Holding Berhad Group of Companies for RM 6.8 million. The reason he purchases the club is to save the club from bankruptcy with former player debts that too high. For 2021, as part of the effort to revamp Kelantan FC and also to bring the Club back to its glory days, Norizam Tukiman reshuffle the whole structure of the Club from the coaching staff to the players. Almost 90% of the players for 2021 season are new players and the native of Kelantan. Kelantan FC also successfully appointed a new line-up of the coaching staff, led by Marco Ragini, to install Italian DNA in Kelantan FC. Apart from restructuring the Club’s line-up, the Management also had taken an effort to slowly acquire assets for the Club such as TRW Hotel & a 4 wheel-drive. The club aims to be qualified in the Malaysian Super League by the year 2024. On 3 May 2021, in one of the most shocking news both in Malaysia and Indonesia, Kelantan FC’s owner, Norizam Tukiman makes another move to expand his empire by purchasing an Indonesia club, PSPS Riau which currently competes in Liga 2, Indonesia. The acquisition opens up opportunities for both Kelantan FC and PSPS Riau to establish long-term cooperation for the mutual benefits of both Clubs.
Headquarters Regions: Asia-Pacific (APAC), Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN), Southeast Asia
Industry Groups: Sports

Description: Graphenest protect electronics and automotive from electromagnetic interference with sustainable graphene-based coatings and plastics
Full Description: Graphenest is a nanotechnology company that provides sustainable graphene-based coatings and plastic solutions and IP to protect electronics from electromagnetic shielding interference. Graphenest offers conductive plastics and coatings products that provide 220% more RF/EMI/EMC Shielding performance while reducing production costs by more than 15% and weight by up to 75%.  Current shielding products are based on metals that are heavy, rigid, and energy & resource-intensive. Our customers are Tier 2 and 1 component or systems manufacturers for batteries (package and electronics control), electronics (housing, IC, printable electronics, antennas), electronics/telecom (Radar, LiDAR, 5G/6G, etc), cables & wires (power and data), among other critical components. Graphenest has vertically integrated material production, formulations, and IP to incorporate into clients' products. Our clean technology to produce graphene using recycled graphite, which is highly scalable, modular, and cost-effective due to implementing a 3R approach in our process, Reduce – Reuse – Recycle and "Industry 5.0" concepts, will enable a fully circular economy.

Description: Ziotag is an AI-powered accessible video platform for all, including people with vision, hearing, ADHD and learning disabilities.
Full Description: Ziotag is an AI-powered accessible video platform for all including people with vision, hearing and learning disabilities.  It makes discovering, searching and navigating video and audio content a seamless experience.  When coupled with assistive technology like screen readers, it is a game changer for people with disabilities.  To make any video accessible, the user copies and pastes the URL of any online video (or audio) and Ziotag will use its deep tech AI engines to automatically generate transcripts, extract the thoughts, ideas and concepts of the content and create an easy to navigate Actionable Table of Contents (AToC).  Now every word, thought, idea and concept of the video is fully searchable with results showing up as a clickable timestamp to the moment of that search phrase. Every segment of your entire video library is now properly indexed and organized. Viewers can search your video gallery or skim the AToC of specific videos to find the topics that are most relevant for them and stay engaged longer because they are consuming exactly what they’re interested in, and interacting with it. This is an absolute game-changer for students, teachers, researchers and knowledge workers.  It helps promote engagement for video podcasters, event producers, online courses, learning and development professionals, content marketers, webinar hosts, and anyone else publishing or watching videos.

Description: Mobile App, Subscription based bicycle service and bicycle insurance.
Full Description: We make people's bicycle life smoother. We offer simple, reliable, and sustainable services for the everyday cyclist who are looking for a more convenient and functioning bicycle life. MIOO contributes to sustainable and healthy cities by enabling billions of kilometers of mobility by pure pedal power! MARKET Cycling is growing rapidly with 2B bikes in the world and +100M sold bikes per year. Bicycle commuting is exploding in large cities through new bike lanes, healthier lifestyles and environmental consciousness. Copenhagen and Amsterdam have close to  50% mobility by bicycle. Paris, London and Stockholm are quickly catching up from 10% levels. Cycling delivers several 100 times more mobility in kilometers than all E-scooters and other mobility companies all together.  IMPACT Bikes are the most efficient, sustainable and healthy way of transportation up to 30km and it is an effective solution for several global challenges. A bicycle emits only 3g of CO2 per km. An everyday cyclist shows a 40% lower mortality risk. PROBLEM  Bicycle sales are moving online. The 20% CAGR of online sales before Covid-19 is now accelerating fast, expected to reach 40% of all sales in many countries by 2025. The shift to online sales requires new types of solutions for customer support and service of the bike. Customers wait on average 12 days to get the bike fixed and even finding a nearby bike repair shop is hard. Millions of bicycles are left in sheds or garages with simpler problems. Millions of bicycles are also reported stolen and rarely get back to the owners even if the Police finds it. People stop biking due to this, leaving all the impacts disabled.  SOLUTION MIOO offers a solution to all this by establishing a  “service & safety” relationship with the user from when the bicycle is unpacked from a delivery box until the bike is sold. PRODUCT / APP - Bicycle service where you are - Assemble your newly online-purchased bike at your doorstep  - Anti theft registration and Bike-id-labeling - Bicycle insurance  - Service book  - Digital and secure change of ownership - IoT ready for Smart locks and GPS - Service and Safety subscription single or family plan BUSINESS MODEL On-demand services act as profitable funnel into a recurring subscriptions 100€ in yearly recurring revenues per user from subscriptions and on-demand sales of service and safety. FINANCIAL GOALS  We are launching 100 cities in the next 5 years, reaching 5 million yearly paying users.  Totaling a revenue of €500M in 2026 with a gross margin of 50%.    TRACTION We have shown a clear problem-solution fit in Stockholm and started to see clear indicators of a product-market fit. We have now launched our second city, London, with even larger potential. STOCKHOLM + 20,000 paying users last 12 month +100 active Bike Buddies/mobile bike service, +500 on short list Profitable in Stockholm 2 years after launch! €500k in revenues, growing with 200% in CAGR LONDON Launched Q2 2021 + 500 paying users after just one quarter with very little marketing.  5 active Bike Buddies, + 100 on short list   PARTNERSHIPS  Swedish tech-insurance company Omocom cover our subscribers' bike insurance.  Internet stores Bikester, an e-commerce bicycle retailer who operates in 14 markets, resells our assembly service in Stockholm this spring as a pilot. About 10% conversion rate on all sold bicycles and + 500 bikes assembled in the pilot . The plan is to launch the same set-up in London during Q1 2022 and scale it to new cities. TEAM Founder and CEO: Tomas Grönqvist ,Former pro-cyclist (5 years on the pro-tour in Italy) turned entrepreneur. Founded cycling startup that was acquired by Salvatore Grimaldi.  Co founders in operations: CTO Kimmo Björnsson (mat.se) COO Jakob Daniels, VPE Resad Zacina (ex-Fishbrain) Angels: Johan Attby (Fishbrain) Per Emanuelsson (Soundtrap), Fredrik Ahlberg (King) Sara & Jon Wimmercranz (Footway / Bambora) Stefan Krook & Karl-Johan Persson (H&M) ROUND Raising €5M  Use of founds: Scaling business in Europe and US
Industry Groups: Apps, Mobile, Other, Software

Description: AMBICION develops new drugs focused on establishing a global standard treatment for cancer patients.
Full Description: AMBICION develops new drugs focused on establishing a global standard treatment for cancer patients. The company's is called product Natural killer T cells or NKT cells, a type of T cells that also have NK cell properties. It is activated by recognizing glycolipid antigens, produce many types of cytokines, and induce both immunostimulation and suppression reactions. NKT cells can induce cell death to cancer cells due to the nature of NK cells, but its direct cytotoxic activity is limited due to the small amount present in the body. NKT cells also have the ability to produce large amounts of cytokines. AMBICION was founded in October 2015 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
Industry Groups: Biotechnology, Data and Analytics, Design, Health Care, Science and Engineering

Description: Enduralock offers the first permanently locking, high vibration resistant fasteners that are reversible and reusable with standard tooling.
Full Description: Enduralock offers the first permanently locking, high vibration resistant fasteners, that for maintenance are reversible and reusable with a standard hex socket. They are ideal for critical applications, as the fasteners remain locked even with total loss of preload (clamping force). Enduralock fasteners survived 10x the aerospace requirement for a self-locking nut, and reusability has been demonstrated to 250 cycles. Enduralock fasteners eliminate the need for safety wire, castle nuts, or adhesives, and a key attribute is that they reduce the time and cost of installation and maintenance.

Description: Customisable Search Platform for Asset Managers/Banks
Full Description: KiteEdge is building the next generation of enterprise search, specifically targeted to the Asset Management Industry. Our SAAS Platform, APEX, consumes financial research - produced by both independent researchers and the large financial institutes - and co-mingles with news, internal documents, emails, and other forms of unstructured content.  Content is indexed, tagged and processed by our semantic analysis engine (NLP & modified Okapi algorithms) to build industry data and relationship models in the form of knowledge graphs. These graphs are combined with 'Cognitive Ontology' to help asset managers make investment decisions.  Benefits move beyond productivity and finding insight to include: simplified MiFID II compliance reporting; research consumption metrics for vendor management/strategic decision making; improved research evaluation/bench-marking capabilities; and critically, the discovery and interpretation of new relationships that can help individuals/teams to create alpha.

Description: YourOwnROOM is a residential real estate prop-tech rental and property management company.
Full Description: Our vision is to bring efficiency into the Residential Real Estate Market by developing and delivering PropTech based services and solutions which will give the asset owners higher economic returns and consumers a better living experience. YourOwnROOM is a residential real estate prop-tech rental and property management company. This includes onboarding and management of residential assets in multiple formats including co-living homes, family homes and alternate assets. The Proptech Platform is modular and can be scaled to deliver other services on top of it.  We currently manage over 400 residential properties/ 2,000 beds spread across 0.5 million square feet, valued at over Rs. 300 crores ($40 M) across Bangalore and Pune. We offer high quality managed co-living and family homes that are safe, comfortable, WFH friendly and strategically located. We also help manage the entire tenant lifecycle from agreement creation and KYC to move in, stay, service requests, renewal, transfer and exits. We act as a trusted custodian of residential assets for homeowners and offer multi year rental & property management services to them. We help them get continuous cash flow, higher rental yields and higher capital appreciation from their residential assets.  We also offer professional operating partner services to developers and real estate funds to increase their sales velocity, rental yields and capital appreciation from their residential asset portfolio. Our biggest differentiator is our, prop-tech platform that integrates our golden execution capabilities. This helps us deliver tenant delight and homeowner satisfaction. This provides us with the foundation to profitably scale our business across multiple cities, residential asset formats and services.

HXG: -------- HXG enables the cost-effective deployment of private high performance LTE and 4G/5G wireless networks. - HXG supports connectivity globally with 200+ countries and 700+ networks. - Businesses who set up their own HXG 5G network open the door to comprehensive, wireless networking of production, maintenance and logistics. ParceLive: ---------------- Real-time cargo tracking and monitoring solution - a global leader in IoT tracking.  - ParceLive, is a real-time, multimodal cargo tracking platform that connects users to live information about the location, condition and security of their assets regardless of their country, carrier or scale. - 7 Intelligent built-in sensors.  - ParceLive has an E-ink display embedded in each tracker along with an international returns postal license on each trackers packaging. This ensures that after use the receiver of a shipment simply removes the tracker and places it into a mailbox where it is returned to Hanhaa for charging and re-use without the need for stamps or packaging.  - Approved by over 30 major airlines. - 65+ days battery life.  - White labelling opportunities.  - API integration.  - Blockchain enabled.  - Telematics enabled.  - Data never crosses the public internet - HXG provides ParceLive with its communications network for security and reliability.

Industries: Cyber Security, Identity Management, Physical Security, Property Management, Security, Software
Description: Revolutionize Physical Security Assets Management. Manage All Physical Security Assets in One Smart & Secure Platform.
Full Description: Meet Keer, a new, smarter way to manage all your Physical Security Hardware in one system that brings your team new capabilities to better orchestrate and protect your premise with efficiency. Nowadays, in most properties, the physical security hardware systems such as Access Control, Alarm Systems, CCTV, sensors, and more, are poorly managed. The traditional physical security infrastructure fails to deliver, it is under-protected and underperforming, and unlike any other security aspect in the organization, the physical security still has critical Cyber Risks and Weaknesses. Having aging hardware, multiple systems, vendor locking, and costly upgrades, keeps the total cost of ownership high and day-to-day operational efficiency low. Last but not least, current systems still missing the technological leverage to support and empower the human factor in the physical security operation. Here is how Keer can revolutionize your organization with its unique cutting-edge technology. Keer will unify all your Physical Security Hardware into one smart, simple and robust system. It will easily and automatically Plug-N-Play to all your Physical Security assets and will connect them all into one smart mesh. Once deployed, Keer will add cutting-edge Cyber protection to your operation, and upscale the day-to-day routines and employee experience by implementing Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning capabilities. With Keer, your team can easily monitor all the events on every site, it will connect the dots for you, automatically identify potential security events and allow you to address them in real-time with greater effectiveness. Keer is one system for all your security needs, command and control center alongside an administrative portal to manage security policies, update access control, guest management, event logger, and more. With Keer, you can be ‘unlocked’ from your existing vendors and discover a new world of possibilities to better protect and orchestrate your Physical Security.

Description: SharpShark is a Blockchain legal tech for a full-cycle intellectual property management that was so complex in the past
Full Description: We’re promoting a blockchain-powered tool that helps to protect intellectual property — namely, all kinds of public content, — and monitor copyright violations.  How it works Blockchain saves the timestamp and the IPFS saves the content, making the data immutable. On saving, the system delivers a digital certificate that becomes the piece of digital evidence of authorship. If somebody tries to save another writer's content, our AI won't allow them to do it: before saving, it would check the internet for reverse content. When saved, if the protected content gets published with no copyright, there'll be an alert. Also, we resolve blockchain-backed copyright issues.

Industries: Cyber Security, Enterprise, Enterprise Software, Internet of Things, Mobile, Mobile Devices, National Security, Security, Software
Description: We virtualize IoT. Cyber security services and products company focused on the connected device marketplace.
Full Description: We Secure IoT.   Cog Systems has been preparing for the revolution in connected device architecture since 2014.  We couple the same techniques of modularity used in cloud computing with the fundamentals of security, trustworthiness, robustness and adaptability to enable highly secure connected devices.    Cog Systems leverages our D4 Secure Platform to isolate critical functions and services on IoT. This approach pro-actively secures these devices by reducing the attack surface and also increases reliability by eliminating single points of failure.  Cog Systems embeds additional security features of double encryption, non-bypassable VPNs, nested VPNs, and secure boot to protect both data at rest and data in transit. The system can scale linearly and infinitely, thus reducing bottlenecks and preserving performance.  All of this is available for the IoT commercial market with the flexibility to run any and all applications effectively and securely.   This unique approach provides the assurance of defense grade security so our customers can focus on delivering best-in-class applications, performance and usability.   Cog Systems, based in Sydney, Australia, leads the industry in secure connected device implementations with 30+ deployments across world governments, defense organizations and corporate enterprises.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Chicago Area, Great Lakes, Midwestern US
Industry Groups: Consumer Electronics, Government and Military, Hardware, Information Technology, Internet Services, Mobile, Other, Privacy and Security, Software
Founders: Carl Nerup, Carl Van Schaik, Daniel Potts, Grant Cushny

Description: AppGas is an internet-based gas solutions service online platform to order gas for consumers.
Full Description: Appgas is a platform developed to facilitate the experience of gas cylinder users, companies and industries. We offer a wide range of features and functionality to make the gas ordering and delivery process more convenient. The user only has to enter his address, and he will be able to compare all gas brands, prices, delivery times and evaluations that other users have given of the platform's suppliers. Thus, consumers can choose the option that best meets their needs. The application has an intuitive and user-friendly interface, allowing users to easily access the available resources. It is available for free download on Android and IOS devices, and also through websites making it accessible to a wide audience. One of the main features of Appgas is the ability to order gas quickly and easily. Users can place orders directly through the app, stating the amount of gas needed and the delivery location. The application integrates gas supply companies, streamlining the service process and ensuring delivery at the desired time. Additionally, Appgas allows users to track the status of their orders in real time. They receive notifications on delivery progress from the moment the order is received until the distribution truck arrives. This provides transparency and peace of mind to users, who can plan better and avoid surprises. The app also offers on-delivery or integrated payment features. Users can register payment information, such as credit cards or bank accounts, and securely and conveniently make payments directly from the app. Another feature of Appgas is the possibility to access relevant information about the use of gas. Users can view consumption histories, receive savings and safety tips. This information helps users to better understand their gas consumption and make more informed decisions regarding its use. The app also has an integrated customer support system. Users can contact the customer service team through the app, ask questions, report issues or request assistance. This provides a direct channel of communication and streamlines the process of resolving issues related to gas supply. In short, Appgas is a handy app for ordering and delivering gas. With features like gas ordering, delivery tracking, integrated payments and access to relevant information, it makes using gas more convenient, safe and efficient for users.
Industry Groups: Apps, Commerce and Shopping, Information Technology, Software

Description: Noho allows people suffering from lymphedema to reduce dynamically their lymphedema whenever and at any time.
Full Description: Change life of people suffering from lymphedema.   Up to now patients have to rely for their entire life on a weekly treatment based on multi-layer compression bandage applied by specialized practitioner. The efficiency of the application is highly dependent on the level of experience of the practitioner.   Noho allows people suffering from lymphedema to reduce dynamically their lymphedema without the need of a third party allowing them to be free from others, manage social stigma and save money. Our product allows the self-treatment of lymphedema everywhere and anytime while the practitioner keeps an eye.   The efficiency of our product has been clinically tested on various patients.   The product is the result of a close collaboration between the Ecole Polytechnique de Bruxelles and the Clinique de Lymphologie de Bruxelles (CHU Saint-Pierre, University Hospital, Brussels). The Clinique is treating more than 1 000 lymphedema per month. Innoviris, the Brussels Institute for Research and Innovation, has financially supported the development of the product.   Let people enjoy life again.

Industries: Artificial Intelligence, Biotechnology, Health Care, Pharmaceutical
Description: Overcoming current limitations of small molecule drug discovery using proprietary structural biology technology and generative AI.
Full Description: CrystalsFirst's MAGNET platform overcomes current limitations of small molecule drug discovery. The integration of high-performance structural biology detects molecular magnets and generative AI/Machine Learning identifies novel molecules and druggable binding pockets for difficult targets.  Our MAGNET Platform is a unique and powerful approach to unlock chemical matter. It integrates the “crystal structure first” strategy, large-scale computational modelling, generative AI and medicinal chemistry. Starting with crystal structures as the first step in drug discovery, we also gain valuable insights into target interactions, enabling rational design from the beginning. Building block chemistry provides rapid access to diverse chemical scaffolds, facilitating hit expansion, scaffold hopping, and efficient compound generation. Computational modelling and machine learning aid in predicting compound properties and optimizing lead candidates.  The synergistic combination of these elements in the MAGNET Platform accelerates the discovery process and increases the likelihood of finding innovative and effective therapeutic compounds.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence, Biotechnology, Data and Analytics, Health Care, Science and Engineering, Software

Description: Access more than 500 self-guided and skip-the-line tours in 24 countries worldwide through your smartphone.
Full Description: We are a multifaceted VC-funded IT company with a strong focus on tourism and the cultural sector. We have cooperated with leading cultural institutions in Greece and abroad in order to create top-rated cultural tourism experiences. Our products are available on the world's leading marketplaces such as travel agencies such as Expedia, booking.com, Viator - TripAdvisor and KLOOK. Clio Muse Tours was founded in 2014 with the vision to generate universal cultural awareness and guide people in every part of the world, utilizing pioneering technology. Nowadays, we have created over 300 top-selling audio and skip-the-line tours as well as virtual tour experiences for both indoor and outdoor attractions in 11 countries including Greece, Italy, Spain, Turkey and the Netherlands. From history and mythology to gastronomy and architecture, our thematic audio tours cover a wide range of topics unraveling historical facts and unknown stories.  Clio Muse Tours has collaborated with numerous world-class cultural institutions creating and curating over 300 audio tours. Both our audio and virtual tours are available for Android and iOS devices and can be used in offline mode.  In 2019 we saw a 12 times growth in our revenue and the highest sales on our audio tours serving 50,000 travelers from all over the world. Due to the COVID-19 outbreak, we were forced to slow down our plans for expansion to new destinations. However, we managed to create an additional revenue stream that completes our business model and enhances our financial growth. We collaborate with even more museums to create digital tours.  Moreover, in 2020 we fully automated our Customer Care Department, which combined with the unlimited availability of our audio tours can really lead the distributors of our products to compensate for the reduced revenues of the previous year. - 10 international awards for our sustainable business model and content methodology  - Served 50K travelers in 2019

Full Description: Confirmo is a SaaS platform for all organizations that need to digitize processes that require a legal signature. The integrated learning assessment system offers digitally documented evidence of understanding that can be used in the event of a lawsuit. In addition to providing a paperless document flow, Confirmo is compliant with the strictest privacy regulations such as the GDPR, significantly simplifying the work of Data Protection Officers. The software can be integrated with all existing systems and is available for all customers, from single professionals to large companies. The application, designed to be easily used by anybody, already has thousands of successfully signed documents. Confirmo, thanks to the fully-aware digital platform,  revolutionizes digital signature providing greater transparency and legal protection.

Built on distributed ledger technology, the Hijro Network acts as a global “fabric” for trade, providing partners and network participants with a much smarter, more secure, and more efficient way to move value and assets around the world. Our applications and solutions are built on the Hijro Network including a multi-bank, multi-lender trade asset marketplace, flexible working capital solutions for businesses, and APIs that allow easy connection into the network. Description: The leading big data credit scoring solutions provider globally for banks, telecoms and other lenders
Full Description: Big Data Scoring (BDS) is the leading big data based credit scoring solutions provider globally. The company’s unique selling point lies in the ability to collect 5,000-15,000 additional data points per each consumer from a wide variety of alternative data sources that have so far been ignored by lenders. Combination of such data with more traditional data sources allows building the most accurate scorecards on the market. Description: Caerus Corp company will remain independent and focused on the orthopedic market.
Full Description: Caerus Corp., a Minnesota corporation, was formed in July of 2015 with the mission to change the course of animal rehabilitation by applying technologies already proven on humans to the veterinary market. The main objective of the company is to serve veterinarians and pet owners by providing life-enhancing solutions and therapies that restore health in companion animals. Our long-term vision is to build a major global veterinary medical rehabilitation company that focuses on the discovery, development, and commercialization of products for the treatment of orthopedic, pain and other rehabilitative conditions for all animals.  We plan to accomplish this vision by finding, licensing, and/or acquiring existing medical device technologies which have already been deployed and proven in the human space, with appropriate modifications for use in the veterinary space. In August of 2015, we secured an exclusive five-year worldwide license from DJO Global (DJO), a major player in the manufacture, distribution, and marketing of medical devices and equipment. The license is for use in animals of the patented thermoformable bracing technology original developed by Exos Corporation. In January of 2016, we acquired OrthoCor Medical, Inc. OrthoCor was an orthopedic medical device company with pain management technology for treating chronic joint pain. We acquired the company so that we could use its technology for creating devices to alleviate chronic pain in animals using its patented PEMF technology. In May of 2016, we acquired Animal OrthoCare, LLC.  Animal OrthoCare is a veterinary custom bracing company focused on creating customized support braces for companion animals. We believe this acquisition allows us to be the only animal bracing and supports company in the country to offer custom, semi-custom and customizable animal braces.  We are confident that our disruptive technologies in animal bracing will give us the ability to rapidly penetrate the external veterinary orthopedic stabilization and support markets.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Minneapolis-Saint Paul Area, Great Lakes, Midwestern US
Industry Groups: Biotechnology, Health Care, Manufacturing, Science and Engineering, Sports

Description: ELDICO develops, produces and sells electron diffractometers for the analysis of solid chemical compounds.
Full Description: ELDICO Scientific AG (The Electron Diffraction Company) is a Swiss hardware company founded in 2019 and based in the Switzerland Innovation Park Innovaare at the Paul Scherrer Institute (PSI), a globally leading Swiss research institute for natural and engineering sciences. ELDICO develops, manufactures and sells novel instruments for electron diffraction in crystallography, enabling nanocrystalline solid state analysis in the sub-micrometer range. Specific instruments are not yet available on the market today. ELDICO will be launching the first instrument specifically designed for nano-crystallographic investigations. The proof of concept was achieved in 2018 (ETH Zurich, C-CINA Basel) as part of a Nano-Argovia project of the Swiss Nanoscience Institute (SNI) on scientifically and industrially relevant samples. It was published in 2018 and awarded as a Top 5 "Breakthrough of the Year 2018" by leading scientific journal SCIENCE. In 2020, ELDICO took second place in the competition for the prestigious pioneer prize awarded by Technopark Zurich and the Zürcher Kantonalbank (ZKB).
Industry Groups: Biotechnology, Health Care, Science and Engineering
Founders: Eric Hovestreydt, Gunther Steinfeld, Gustavo Santiso-Quinones, Nils Gebhardt

Description: UNMANNED AERIAL VEHICLES LANDING ASSISTANCE SYSTEMS
Full Description: At the moment, low security is the main obstacle to the widespread use of drones. In many ways, the problems associated with accurate landing in places with limited zones. Until now, manufacturers and system developers continue to use manual control - as an opportunity to adjust the landing in those places where the accuracy of receiving GPS signals is limited. Existing systems do not provide reliable results in various conditions. Some do not work in low light, other systems have limited range and accuracy of determining the landing site. And in general, the existing systems are very unstable in gusting wind conditions, as a result of which the drone has to perform sharp maneuvers. That is why we decided to develop a system that will solve all these issues. Our main task is to make the operation of unmanned aerial vehicles simple and safe.

Description: Two-sided marketplace for clinician jobs. Ivy is the simplest way for physicians, PAs and nurse practitioners to match with jobs they love.
Full Description: Ivy Clinicians is the first to map the entire US emergency medicine employer market. We have made that information searchable and filterable so emergency clinicians can connect with the right in-house recruiters. Ivy is led by physicians, PAs, and entrepreneurs dedicated to improving the healthcare job market.  Prior to Ivy, it was difficult for clinicians to find out which group staffs an ER, who the right contact person is, and what the working conditions are at the site. For recruiters, finding clinician matches was difficult because providers don’t have a simple, secure way to indicate interest in particular jobs and to communicate their priorities. Ivy is designed to connect clinicians with in-house recruiters so both find what they’re looking for, spam-free.  Ivy Clinicians is free for physicians, PAs and nurse practitioners. Ivy charges employers less than 2% of first year salary when a clinician is hired from an Ivy match. Ivy keeps costs low, is free until a clinician is hired, and has no hidden (eg: retention) fees. Ivy is where clinicians go first.

Industries: Autonomous Vehicles, Computer Vision, Consumer Electronics, Machine Learning, Robotics
Description: Level-5, truly autonomous, computer vision-based robots that save people time and energy.
Full Description: We are building robots that can learn from the environment by moving around and interacting with it. We believe in owning the full stack from the lowest levels of software to the actual hardware. We design and produce robots under one roof to accelerate our iteration cycle. Our integration starts all the way from the firmware to the electricial engineering to the actual assembly of the robot. Foundational to our mission is the ability for the robot to see the world in 3D using just regular cameras. We developed a neural network to see the world in depth using stereo cameras and a SLAM system to locate our robot in 3D space. We believe that the fastest and the most robust way to learn about the world is through interaction. When our robot encounters a novel object, it can move around to observe the object from different angles and viewpoints to acquire more data. Matician is led by repeat founders Navneet Dalal and Mehul Nariyawala. Navneet has a PhD in Computer Vision and is perhaps best known for his thesis, Histogram of Oriented Gradients (HOG), a landmark in computer vision research, which remained the state-of-the-art for 10 years with over 35,000 citations. Navneet and Mehul were early employees at a startup called Like.com, which pioneered facial recognition in images in 2005 and was acquired by Google in 2010. Next, they started Flutter (Y Combinator W12), a startup that built on-device hand-gesture recognition. The algorithms worked locally on the device using the webcam with just an 800kB footprint. And yet, Flutter beat the state-of-the-art algorithms in accuracy and recall, leading to its acquisition by Google in 2013. At the time of acquisition, Flutter was the #1 Mac Store app in 73 countries and its users had performed over 77 million gestures. At Google, they helped launch Google Cardboard at Google Research. Later, the team moved over to Nest where Mehul was the Lead PM for Nest Cam and Navneet led the algorithms team. The team conceptualized and launched Nest Cam Outdoor, Nest Cam IQ, and Nest Hello Doorbell along with other computer vision features such as person and stranger detection. In 2017, Mehul and Navneet returned to the startup world, co-founding Matician. They have since grown the team to over 25, including Google, Tesla, and Cisco alumni, all working together to bring the vision of home autonomy into the hands of our customers.
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, Silicon Valley, West Coast
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence, Consumer Electronics, Data and Analytics, Hardware, Science and Engineering, Software, Transportation

Description: The world's most private and secure email service
Full Description: Criptext is the world's first and only email service to never collect and store your data. All your emails are exclusively stored in your device for maximum privacy and control. Beyond privacy, Criptext in the only email service to boast the coveted Signal encryption, making it quite possibly the most secure email service - ever. No gimmicks, just easy to use email that's built around your privacy and security. Features: +End-to-end Encryption: Criptext uses the open source Signal Protocol library to encrypt your emails. Your emails are locked with a unique key that‘s generated and stored on your device alone, which means only you and your intended recipient can read the emails you send. +No data collection: unlike every other email service out there, Criptext doesn't store your emails in its servers. Instead, your entire inbox is stored exclusively on your device. +Open Source: our source code is open for everyone to see that Criptext actually works the way it's advertised. You don't have to trust us, you can verify for yourself: https://github.com/Criptext +Easy to use: our app is designed to work as simple as any other email app — so much so, you'll forget how secure it is.

Description: Headway — an EdTech startup that creates microlearning products, helping 50M+ private and corporate users worldwide achieve their goals.
Full Description: Headway is a global EdTech startup with Ukrainian roots that creates microlearning products, helping 50M+ private and corporate users worldwide achieve their goals.  We are passionate about self-improvement and mission-driven. Founded in 2019, Headway has grown from a 3-person startup into a team of 170+ people in 4 years. Headway has offices in London, Kyiv, Nicosia, and Warsaw. Headway was included in the Global Silicon Valley's GSV 150 list of the world’s most transformative digital learning and workforce skills companies. In 2023, GP Bullhound highlighted Headway among the top 50 companies with the most potential to become billion-dollar companies in the next two years. Headway is the finalist of The Europas Hottest EdTech Startups Awards 2022.  Our flagship product is the Headway app which provides fun and easy growth through non-fiction insights.  It offers key ideas from the world's bestsellers to grow on the go. The Headway app helps users worldwide feel motivated, learn, and do more, overcome FOMO, and make self-growth a sustainable habit with whatever format suits their needs best.  People can interact with the app by joining self-growth challenges; enjoying daily insights & widgets that motivate; reading & listening to 15-minute summaries from the best nonfiction books available in text and audio performed by professional voice actors With over 27 million downloads the Headway app is the world's most downloaded book summary app. Headway is also in the top 10 of Free Education on App Store and Google Play across our core markets (e.g., USA, Canada, Great Britain). Founded by Stanford engineers, Calii is taking a full-stack, tech-driven approach connecting directly with producers and brands, automating the food supply chain end-to-end, and delivering to users’ doorsteps via a network of micro-fulfillment centers. By cutting middlemen and inefficiencies in the food supply chain, users get ultra-fresh groceries with savings, meanwhile helping the environment by reducing waste by up to 3X. Even though COVID-19 increased the use of grocery delivery apps, grocery shopping remains largely offline (~95%) and represents a multi-trillion dollar opportunity. Calii is already cracking the $1T groceries market in its path to become the next-gen Amazon in LatAm.

Description: AmpUp is an electric vehicle (EV) charging company that enables drivers, hosts, and fleets to charge stress-free.
Full Description: AmpUp is the leading electric vehicle (EV) charging operating system that enables drivers, hosts, and fleets to charge stress-free. Our technology makes it easy for businesses and property owners to manage multiple charge stations and locations in one platform. We enable our customers to achieve their electrification goals faster and easier than they imagined possible. With headquarters in Santa Clara, CA, AmpUp’s network and software solutions have been deployed for customers across North America. Key customers include JLL, CBRE, Domino's Pizza, Goodyear, Holman Enterprises, New Balance, Under Armour, Citizens Bank, Hilton Garden Inn, and Holiday Inn. AmpUp was founded in 2018 and incubated by the YCombinator accelerator. The company was formed by nomad electric vehicle drivers to solve a problem that many others experience: owning an electric car without home charging. AmpUp first released a mobile app to build a shared charging network, or a way for hosts to make their charge stations publicly available for all electric vehicle drivers. The service quickly began to decrease range anxiety, providing an important service to the EV community. AmpUp has since released new charging management solutions for customers of all types yet our commitment to public charging is still ingrained in all of our products today.

Description: Carepay is a Care fintech solution that aims to provide equal, accessible and affordable healthcare services to all individuals
Full Description: The CarePay is creating a new way to pay for care that is more affordable and accessible. With CarePay, you can get the care you need when you need it without having to worry about the cost. Our Care Now Pay Later model combines membership benefits and health insurance. We offer different payment options including monthly instalments and no-interest financing.  The Care Now Pay Later model is a relatively new concept in the Asian market, so there are not many direct competitors yet. However, there are a number of companies that offer similar services, such as: Atome: Atome is a Singapore-based BNPL company that offers instalment plans for online and offline purchases. It is currently available in 7 countries in Southeast Asia, including Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand, Indonesia, Vietnam, the Philippines, and Hong Kong. Hoolah: Hoolah is an Australian BNPL company that offers instalment plans for online and offline purchases. It is currently available in Australia, Singapore, and New Zealand. Splitit: Splitit is an Israeli BNPL company that offers instalment plans for online and offline purchases. It is currently available in 40 countries, including the United States, Canada, the United Kingdom, and Australia. Sezzle: Sezzle is an American BNPL company that offers instalment plans for online purchases. It is currently available in the United States, Canada, Australia, and the United Kingdom. Klarna: Klarna is a Swedish BNPL company that offers instalment plans for online and offline purchases. It is currently available in 17 countries, including the United States, Canada, the United Kingdom, and Australia. These companies all offer similar services to Care Now Pay Later, but they may have different features and fees. It is important to compare the different options available before choosing a BNPL provider. The Care Now Pay Later model is still a relatively new concept in the Asian market, so it is likely that more competitors will emerge in the future. This is because the BNPL market is growing rapidly in Asia, and there is a demand for more flexible payment options. We can capture a significant share of the $600M billion dollar care market in Asia. It is expected to grow at a CAGR of 5.5% from 2023 to 2030, reaching $914 billion by 2030. If you're looking for a more affordable and accessible way to pay for care, then CarePay is your solution. Visit our website https://carepay.mn/ or contact us to learn more.
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain and Cryptocurrency, Data and Analytics, Financial Services, Health Care, Information Technology, Other, Payments, Science and Engineering, Software

FEATURES - Video Recording of the trips, stored in the cloud  - Live Stream your trip with anyone in a browser - Group Trips - track group members on a long trip - Multi-Stop trips - with "most-efficient" route - Driver Score - improves driving habits - Maintenance Alerts – insurance, inspection, road tax expiration alerts - NFT Car Garage - own cars on the blockchain, see and showcase them as 3D NFT models to others in the app DRIVE TO EARN Earn MILE tokens by driving your real life car using the first A.I. navigation app  Convert MILE to NAVI tokens for NFT vehicle upgrades PLAY TO EARN Play with realistic 3D NFT cars in the first mass blockchain virtual racing game Race  online users in weekly competitions for higher NAVI token rewards Trade your virtual car NFTs with other users (vehicle upgrades  increase its value) OWN  THE  AUTO BRAND  TO EARN Purchase Brand Ambassador NFTs for lifetime royalties when users buy NFT cars from that brand. Brand Ambassador positions are VERY RARE and will likely increase in value. NFT CAR GARAGE The AtlasNavi Garage is an interactive car configurator, where you can showcase and customize your NFT cars. Upgrade your vehicles by spending NAVI tokens and making them more valuable (different body paints, trim and engine upgrades) Buy, sell or exchange your vehicles NFTs on the open market No crypto knowledge needed NFTs MARKETPLACE We are creating NFT images with well-known car brands with a different set of characteristics and rarity. Every car is represented by a non-fungible token (NFT). Owning this token means you are the sole owner of this car. The vehicles will be available in 4 tiers with a limited supply and scarcity: - Common Brands - Premium Brands - Legendary Brands - Unique Brands
Headquarters Regions: Asia-Pacific (APAC), Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN), Southeast Asia

Description: Bygrad is an #1 No. online higher education platform.
Full Description: Bygrad is a educational-technology company that is charting new routes in the domain of professional education. Going beyond the traditional focus on data concepts, Bygrad takes a wider approach in introducing students to the real world. Bygrad began in 2016 with the conviction that in an ever-changing industry, professionals need to continuously upskill themselves in order to stay relevant. We are an ed-tech company that offers programs in career critical competencies. At Bygrad, our programs always focus on the next frontier of growth in industry and currently straddle across Analytics, Data Science, Big Data, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, Digital Marketing, Cloud Computing and more!
Industry Groups: Education, Software
